titleStmt.title: Panacea: or, Select aphorismes, diuine and morall
titleStmt.author: G., R., Sir, fl. 1630.

notesStmt.note: "A characterisme of the foure cardinall vertues", by Sir R.G., Knight, has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
